analysis.description:
TrypCrowdsale.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#290-293) shadows:
	- BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#117)

TrypCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#383-390) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#389)

TrypCrowdsale.deliverTokensAdmin (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#391-396) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#394-395)

Reentrancy in TrypCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#383-390):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#389)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- remainingSupply_ (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#390)

Reentrancy in TrypCrowdsale.deliverTokensAdmin (/unique_chucks/42/0xbba67b58cb5059f388cae3d7597ebac6cb70dfe6.sol#391-396):
	External calls:
